name: ROMBIE
description: Modular robotics & a Central Command was suppose to usher in prosperity, yet something went terribly wrong... ROMBIEs now scour the artificial wasteland for credits, modules & purpose. You, the Elite Recovery, spawned after a routine check on society started to fail...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Quad core+ Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA / AMD Accelerated (Intel HD not recommended) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Beep boop
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: AMD 8350+ or equivelant for VR Graphics: GTX 1070+ or equivelant for VR DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: BEEP BLOOP BOP
